name: 傅子恒　教師諮商時間(Office Hours)
objective:
本課程以互動藝術創作為目標，透過創意編程及邊緣運算兩大學習主軸，逐步引導學生進入互動藝術創作的領域。

This course targets at interactive art creation. By mastering the two main topics throughout the course including creative coding and edge computation, students will be introduced to the domain of interactive art creation.
schedule:
W01: Ch1. Generative Art: In Theory and Practice
W02: Ch2. Processing: A Programming Language for Artists
W03: Special Topics: Node Box 3, Point Allocation, Line Connection, Modulation
W04: Ch3. The Wrong Way to Draw a Line
W05: Ch4. The Wrong Way to Draw a Circle
W06: Ch5. Adding Dimensions
W07: Ch6. Emergence
W08: Special Topics: Attractor, Random Walker, Force Field
W09: Mid-term
W10: Special Topic: NFT
W11: Ch7. Autonomy
W12: Final Project Proposal
W13: Special Topic: Edge Computing
W14: Special Topic: Edge Computing
W15: Special Topic: Edge Computing
W16: Special Topic: Edge Computing
W17: Ch8. Fractals
W18: Final Project Demo
scorePolicy:
作業: 20%
上台報告: 10% 
期中分數: 25%
期末專案: 45%
materials: Generative Art – a practical guide using processing, Matt Pearson
remarks: 將於開學後成立 MS Teams 群組，輔助各項課程環節，包括諮詢。
